com.codekutter.zconfig.common.readers

Class AbstractConfigReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codekutter.zconfig.common.readers.AbstractConfigReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigFileReader, ConfigURLReader

    public abstract class AbstractConfigReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Abstract base class for reading configuration data.
